title: Sampler, 1818
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross, herringbone, rococo and eye stitches on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Bought in New England 1907.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Six alphabets separated by narrow geometric borders, and lower halves of two decorative octagons, all in black.  Some of the alphabets are missing the letter J.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1818.
1818. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross, herringbone, rococo and eye stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-8.
